RegExExpression.Pattern: (?i)template|templ|tmpl|ng|tmp|SW|SolarWinds|ForeScout|Test|2016 Server virtual machine|6.5 vCenter Do Not Touch|IP0[1-3]|NSX|201[69] Server|vCLS|Cisco IMC Supervisor|East-ESG0

DisplayString.Name: NICE VMWare Monitoring Customizations
DisplayString.Description: v1.0.0.7 18 Jul 2023 - Updated Recovery rules to informational, only Recovery failed is WARN v1.0.0.4 11 Nov 2022 - Tuning alerts to outage Critical/Warning v1.0.0.0 7 June 2021 - Created NiCE VMWare customizations pack
